name: Fraudulent advertising
text: §448-4  Fraudulent advertising.  It shall be unlawful for any person to publish or circulate, directly or indirectly, any statements relating to the person's practice of dentistry that are or tend to be false, fraudulent, or misleading.  A violation of this section shall subject the licensee to the penalties provided in section 448-17. [L 1917, c 136, §4; RL 1925, §1068; RL 1935, §983; am L 1937, c 220, §2; RL 1945, §2154; am L 1947, c 170, §1; am L 1949, c 177, §1; RL 1955, §61-4; HRS §448-4; am L 1983, c 220, §2; am L 2009, c 131, §1]
